position.title: Postdoctoral Researcher
fields: Software Architecture and Software Evaluation (Quality attributes)
position.description: If you're an applied researcher with a passion for practical European projects, this is your opportunity to elevate your work in Software Engineering and contribute to impactful research with real-world relevance.

application.notes: If there is any question, please feel free to contact via email at [log in to unmask]. It would be greatly appreciated if you could circulate this position among your research team or through your professional network.

content.closing: To contribute to SEWORLD, send your submission to mailto:[log in to unmask].
